H0.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Till Death Us Do Part

H1.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Steptoe and Son

H3.text: Which comedy written by Johnny Speight which first aired in 1965, featured a fervent West Ham supporter. Else Garnett

A4.text: In 1965, Speight wrote a BBC TV pilot which became the 1966 series Till Death Us Do Part
